title: init(x:y:z:)

rawIndexableTextContent: Returns a vector that is the difference of the vectors you provide.  The first vector. The second vector.
summary: Returns a vector that is the difference of the vectors you provide.

rawIndexableTextContent: Inherited from Equatable.!=(_:_:).
summary: Inherited from Equatable.!=(_:_:).

rawIndexableTextContent: The x coordinate position of the vertex.
summary: The x coordinate position of the vertex.
title: x

rawIndexableTextContent: Returns the distance to another point in space.  The point in space to compare.
summary: Returns the distance to another point in space.
title: distance(from:)

rawIndexableTextContent: Creates a new texture coordinate.  The u coordinate. The v coordinate.
summary: Creates a new texture coordinate.
title: init(u:v:)

rawIndexableTextContent: Creates a triangle from a tuple of three vector positions.  The points making up the face of a polygon. The material to use for rendering the polygon. Discussion Vertex normals will be set to match face normal based on the positions being listed in a counter-clockwise direction.
summary: Creates a triangle from a tuple of three vector positions.
title: init(_:material:)

rawIndexableTextContent: The distance from the center of the plane to the world origin coordinates.
summary: The distance from the center of the plane to the world origin coordinates.
title: w

rawIndexableTextContent: Creates a new texture coordinate.  The u coordinate. The v coordinate.
summary: Creates a new texture coordinate.
title: init(u:v:)

rawIndexableTextContent: A struct that represents texture coordinates.
summary: A struct that represents texture coordinates.
title: TextureCoordinates

rawIndexableTextContent: Inherited from Comparable...<(_:).
summary: Inherited from Comparable...<(_:).

rawIndexableTextContent: Indicates that the mesh is watertight.  Discussion For example, the value is true if every edge is attached to at least 2 triangles. A mesh being watertight doesn’t verify that mesh is not self-intersecting or inside-out.
summary: Indicates that the mesh is watertight.
title: isWatertight

rawIndexableTextContent: Creates a new triangle with material you provide.  The normal to apply to the vertex.
summary: Creates a new triangle with material you provide.
title: with(material:)
